name: Inculcation
description:
Take control of some alien insect, trapped deep in a lab. Make your escape by crawling through vents, and burying yourself into your enemies, controlling them for your own purposes to open doors.. or kill their friends.

The game might run poorly in chrome, if so try firefox (or download the windows version)

Controls:
Move - WASD
Posses - SPACE
Restart- R
Interact - E
Shoot - Mouse1
Cycle vents - TAB
